00021 include_once("rendergauge.php");
00022 
00023 function errImg($err) {
00024     $w = 200;
00025     $h = 100;
00026     $im = imagecreate($w,$h);
00027     $black = imagecolorallocate ($im,0x00,0x00,0x00);
00028     $white = imagecolorallocate ($im,0xff,0xff,0xff);
00029     imagefilledrectangle($im,0,0,$w,$h,$white);
00030 
00031     imagestring($im, 2, 10, 10, $err, $black);
00032 
00033     header("Content-type: image/png");
00034     imagepng($im);
00035 }
00036 
00037 # Time to go back [from now]
00038 $startdelta = time() - 1262889680;
00039 if(!empty($_REQUEST['startdelta'])) {
00040     $startdelta = (int)$_REQUEST['startdelta'];
00041 }
00042 
00043 $dbfilename = "ces2010.db";
00044 if(!empty($_REQUEST['dbfilename'])) {
00045     $dbfilename = $_REQUEST['dbfilename'];
00046 }
00047 
00048 # Actual column name in the obd table in the database
00049 $datacolumn = "vss";
00050 if(!empty($_REQUEST['datacolumn'])) {
00051     $datacolumn = $_REQUEST['datacolumn'];
00052 }
00053 
00054 # Human friendly name for column
00055 $dataname = "Vehicle Speed";
00056 if(!empty($_REQUEST['dataname'])) {
00057     $dataname = $_REQUEST['dataname'];
00058 }
00059 
00060 # Minimum reasonable value for data [ie, left of gauge]
00061 $datamin = 0;
00062 if(!empty($_REQUEST['datamin'])) {
00063     $datamin = $_REQUEST['datamin'];
00064 }
00065 
00066 # Maximum reasonable value for data [ie, right of gauge]
00067 $datamax = 255;
00068 if(!empty($_REQUEST['datamax'])) {
00069     $datamax = $_REQUEST['datamax'];
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 $db = new PDO("sqlite:$dbfilename");
00074 if(!$db) {
00075     $err = "Error opening database\n$dbfilename\n";
00076     errImg($err);
00077     exit(1);
00078 }
00079 
00080 # Instead of trying to escape the column name, we check to see if we
00081 #    can find the column they ask for
00082 $sql = "PRAGMA table_info(obd)";
00083 
00084 $stmt = $db->prepare($sql);
00085 if(!$stmt) {
00086     $err = "Couldn't prepare statment\n$sql\n";
00087     errImg($err);
00088     exit(1);
00089 }
00090 
00091 $stmt->execute();
00092 $found = 0;
00093 while(false != ($row = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC))) {
00094     if($row['name'] == $datacolumn) {
00095         $found = 1;
00096     }
00097 }
00098 
00099 if(0 == $found) {
00100     $err = "Couldn't find column\n$datacolumn\n";
00101     errImg($err);
00102     exit(1);
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 $starttime = time() - $startdelta;
00107 $sql = "SELECT $datacolumn,time FROM obd WHERE time>=$starttime ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1";
00108 
00109 $stmt = $db->prepare($sql);
00110 if(!$stmt) {
00111     $err = "Couldn't prepare statement\n$sql";
00112     errImg($err);
00113     exit(1);
00114 }
00115 
00116 $stmt->execute();
00117 $showval = "Unknown";
00118 $showtime = "Unknown";
00119 if(false != ($row = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC))) {
00120     $showval = $row[$datacolumn];
00121     $showtime = $row["time"];
00122 }
00123 
00124 header("Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate");
00125 header("Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT");
00126 renderGauge($datacolumn, $dataname, $datamin, $datamax, $showval, "");
00127 
00128 ?>
